meanings.sent1: She endeared herself to everyone with her kindness.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's playful antics endeared him to the whole family.
meanings.sent3: His habit of singing in the shower endeared him to his roommates.
meanings.sent4: The old couple's enduring love story endeared them to the entire neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The little girl's innocent smile endeared her to all who met her.

meanings.definition: To cause to be loved or admired
meanings.sent1: Her selfless actions endeared her to the community.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's dedication to her students endeared her to the school staff.
meanings.sent3: His quirky sense of humor endeared him to his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The chef's delicious dishes endeared him to food critics worldwide.
meanings.sent5: The rescue dog's loyalty endeared him to his new family.
